{{Infobox dungeon |name = Spear Pillar |image = [[File:Spear Pillar.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Spear Pillar. |tokens = 96,500 |location = Northeast of Mt. Coronet South, just below the middle of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} '''Spear Pillar''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 1,853,500 |- | Palkia (Boss) || 9,000,000 |- | Dialga (Boss) || 9,000,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Croagunk * Stunky * Glameow * Bronzor * Golbat * Palkia (boss) * Dialga (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
